dct_title_s: Right of way and track map, the Paterson, Newark & New York R.R. Co., operated by Erie Railroad Company, New York Division, Newark Branch, Station 471 + 70 to Station 524 + 53
dct_description_sm: Map showing the right of way and track lines along the Passaic River through various business and personal property lots for the Paterson, Newark and New York Railroad Companies.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Map is stamped "preliminary", and is unsigned, suggesting that it is a draft.
Dr. by H.S.W., Tr. by H.S.W., Ck by T.F.
Sheet No. 2 ��� V.S. - 17 - N.J. of The Paterson, Newark & New York Railroad Company from survey station 471 + 70 to survey station 524 + 53
